Priice Vasili bent his head and spread out his hands. 
At this moment that terrible door, which Pierre had watched so long and which had al- ways opened so quietly, burst noisily open and banged against the wall, and the second of the three sisters rushed out wringing her hands. 
"What are you doing!" she cried vehemently. "He isdyingand you leave me alone with him!" 
Her sister dropped the portfolio. Anna Mik- hdylovna, stooping, quickly caught up the ob- ject of contentio
